pages.title: Pier Peep
pages.text: Pier Peeps, literally just floating eyes that oddly

enough, are able in the middle of a spectral plane all the while still existing in the one I found them in, the surroundings that'd prove as good hiding spots are completely useless to these creatures, as their spectral form allows them to freely fly at me without warning. $(br)$(br) It's clear to me that these creatures haven't any need or way of eating, so the diet thing here is out the window. $(br)$(br) Just floating eyes.
